p: Patients infected with SARS-CoV-2 can present a wide range of symptoms ranging from mild to severe. Fever, cough, and shortness of breath are the most common symptoms reported in 83, 82, and 31% of patients [ 13]. In those patients who develop pneumonia, multiple mottling and ground-glass opacity are described on chest X-ray [ 1, 13]. Patients that develop acute respiratory distress syndrome may worsen rapidly and die of multiple organ failure [ 13].
